original_title: Star Wars: Evolution of the Lightsaber Duel
overview: Though lightsabers have been a force in the Star Wars galaxy since George Lucas’ original film, the weapon’s on-screen presence evolved throughout both cinematic trilogies and into Star Wars: The Force Awakens. SportsCenter is tracing the lightsaber’s lineage through the films, and a new trailer for the special will definitely delight any fan’s inner Star Wars Kid.
tagline: An exploration into the martial art of kendo
title: Star Wars: Evolution of the Lightsaber Duel
